existing_features.title: Make the top app header responsive on small/mobile screens so the navigation (Library/Albums/Vault/Settings) and the Login/Logout button do not overflow horizontally or cause content to be pushed off-screen.

Adjust the main page layout so that active pages (Library/Albums/Vault/Settings) render correctly beneath the header on mobile, avoiding large empty areas or hidden content as shown in the uploaded screenshots.
Ensure the frontend build completes successfully after the layout changes.
